txt.en: 'Terrible spectres passed through Calembel, and the people hid inside their houses.'
'Frightening apparitions came through Calembel before sundown!'
'A powerful fear fell upon Lamedon before sundown, and the people hid within their houses.'
'Do not say this too loudly, but I think the Dead passed through Calembel, heading east!'
'I am not shamed to tell you that we hid within our houses when the fear came to Lamedon.'
